options.code:
colorDirectory = {
  btnPrimaryBg: "#5079ffff",
  btnPrimaryBorder: "#ffffff00",
  btnPrimaryText: "#ffffffff",
  btnSecondaryBg: "#ffffffb3",
  btnSecondaryBorder: "#5079ffff",
  btnSecondaryText: "#5079ffff",
  main: "#3e63ddff",
  modalBodyBg: "#ffffff00",
  modalHeaderBg: "#3e63ddff",
  modalHeaderText: "#ffffffff",
  navbarBg: "#3e63ddff",
  navbarBtnBg: "#ffffff1a",
  navbarBtnBorder: "#ffffffff",
  navbarBtnText: "#ffffffff",
  navbarText: "#ffffffff",
  tabHighlight: "#3e63ddff",
};

return colorDirectory;

options.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(200),
    quantity INT,
    status VARCHAR(30),
    price FLOAT,
    description VARCHAR(500),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true
);

events.message: Failed to add product! Please check and try again.

options.query:
{{`UPDATE products
SET 
    product_name = '${components.textinput2.value}',
    quantity = ${components.numberinput5.value},
    status = '${components.dropdown5.value}',
    price = ${components.numberinput6.value},
    description = '${components.textarea3.value}',
    category = '${components.dropdown6.value}'
WHERE id = ${components.table1.selectedRow.id}
AND is_active = true;`}}

events.message: Failed to update product details! Please check and try again.

options.query:
{{`SELECT *
FROM products
WHERE
    is_active = true
    AND (
        product_name ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        status ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        description ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        category ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%'
    )
ORDER BY id DESC;`}}
